mono.usage: Hex codes, grid dimensions, technical data

colors.usage_rules: Background must be warm beige (#FDFBF7). Use Orange (#F97316) strictly for active states, primary buttons, and selected items. Text should be warm charcoal, never pure black.

layout.grid_strategy: Sidebar/Top for controls, Large area for preview. Split view for Before/After.
layout.spacing: Generous. Use gap-6 or gap-8 between major sections.

upload_zone.style: dashed border-2 border-border hover:border-accent/50 transition-colors bg-white/50 rounded-xl p-12 text-center cursor-pointer

palette_grid.item_style: w-8 h-8 rounded-md cursor-pointer border border-transparent hover:scale-110 transition-transform shadow-sm ring-offset-2 focus:ring-2 ring-accent

preview_container.style: relative aspect-square or 4:3 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-border overflow-hidden flex items-center justify-center pixelated-rendering

controls.button: Shadcn Button, pill-shaped for primary actions

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #E7E5E4. Active elements get 2px orange border.
visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay on the beige background to enhance tactile feel.

tech_stack.canvas_logic: HTML5 Canvas API for pixel manipulation

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a dual-canvas approach: one hidden canvas for processing, one visible for rendering.
Use 'image-rendering: pixelated' CSS property on the preview canvas to ensure sharp edges.
The 20-color palette should be an array of hex codes. Implement a 'nearest neighbor' color matching algorithm in JS.
Ensure the drag-and-drop zone handles file validation (images only).
Make the UI responsive: Stack controls above preview on mobile, side-by-side on desktop.
Do not use heavy external libraries for image processing; stick to raw Canvas API for speed.
Add a 'Download' button that exports the canvas content as PNG.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the orange accent; keep it flat and bold.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (opacity change or transform).
Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons.
